title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the Federated Learning Framework. These should include data privacy considerations (such as differential privacy, secure multi-party computation, federated-averaging algorithms), target platforms (mobile, IoT, edge computing), performance goals (e.g., model accuracy, latency, memory usage, energy efficiency), scalability requirements (number of devices and data size, handling large scale distributed training), security measures (encryption, access controls, secure storage solutions), APIs or interfaces required for integration with other systems (RESTful API, gRPC, SDKs), potential use cases and scenarios where the framework could be applied (real-time anomaly detection, personalized recommendation systems, etc.). Additionally, consider the trade-offs between privacy, performance, and utility. Provide examples of real-world applications that can benefit from this framework.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the Federated Learning Framework, including components, data flow, and communication protocols.

title: Implement Core Components
description: Develop the core components of the Federated Learning Framework, including the federated learning algorithm, communication protocols, and data privacy mechanisms.

title: Develop Client Libraries
description: Create client libraries for mobile and IoT devices to interact with the Federated Learning Framework.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Develop and integrate security and privacy measures to ensure data protection and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish a testing framework and continuous integration pipeline for the Federated Learning Framework.

title: Prepare Deployment and Monitoring
description: Set up the deployment and monitoring infrastructure for the Federated Learning Framework, including cloud or on-premises hosting, and monitoring tools.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the Federated Learning Framework, including installation guides, API references, and user manuals.
